setting.location: Hilltop overlooking La Mancha plains, Spain

scene.mainElements: Iconic windmills silhouetted against dramatic sunset sky, empty road winding past them, landscape unchanged but somehow transformed by stories, eternal monument to imagination's power, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Four windmills with sails turning slowly in evening breeze, golden wheat fields rippling below, abandoned lance shaft leaning against windmill base, wheel ruts in dirt road, single olive tree providing foreground, birds returning to roost, long shadows stretching across landscape, worn stone marker beside path, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Vast La Mancha plains extending to horizon, distant village lights beginning to twinkle, mountains purple in fading light
scene.atmosphere: Timeless quality of landscape that birthed legend, ordinary structures become extraordinary through story, sunset suggesting endings but also eternal returns, peace after adventure, reality and fantasy forever intertwined in this place, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Epic wide shot from elevated position
composition.focus: Windmills as central monuments against sunset
composition.depth: Foreground shows rocky hilltop and olive tree, middle ground features windmills and winding road, background fades into endless plains and sunset

colorPalette.usageNotes: Black lines on white background only
